channel.title: poems on dill & fennel
channel.description: Recent content in poems on dill & fennel

item.title: no cis men
item.description: no cis men, says the sign on the door and i read, prove yourself are you woman enough to enter this building not woman like dresses but woman like a body you didn’t get for free the feeling that these spaces want to spit us out like we won’t be safe from the pain of judgement because it follows us in and comes out through their eyes do you see me?
